name: ETAON
description:
ETAON is in the late stages of development and while it is, ETAON is free to play. 
Just a chill and challenging puzzle game

no timers
no commercials
no microtransactions

What's being worked on:
Fixing up the camera zoom and panning 
General bug fixing

Planned features:
PC port
System for different block colors

See something weird? something good? Make a post below! I'd love to hear what you think
